title: How did the Cold War fare? - Quora

response.answer_text: The USA won, the Soviet Union lost. Germany reunified peacefully into a (more or less) free market, democratic society. Communism doesn’t work, and always eventually runs out of other people’s money. It usually leaves behind mountains of skulls trying, though. Infogalactic: the planetary knowledge core
It went away with the death of the USSR but has apparently resumed due to Putin's imperial ambitions.
